name: AIG Europe S.A.
membership: ABI (Association of British Insurers) and other relevant national insurance associations eg. GDV, FFA. ANIA etc.
goal: AIG Europe Limited is a part of AIG, a leading international insurance organisation serving customers across the world. AIG companies serve commercial, institutional and individual customers through one of the most extensive worldwide property-casualty networks of any insurer.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: All insurance files eg. Insurance Distribution Directive, General Data Protection Regulation, Solvency II, Insurance Block Exemption Regulation etc.  Also files relating to innovation, technology and product liability.  Interested in sustainable finance, capital standards, energy etc.
